/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on
DD Form 214
, including
service department issuance of
DD Form 214
when service departments provide VA with a certificate of release
notices of separation that PHS and NOAA use
handling
copies of
DD Form 214
in a service treatment record (STR) document in the Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS)
, and
paper copies of
DD Form 214
received from the RMC
, and
service information in the corporate record
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Service Requirements and Verification of Eligibility
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
